title: Default app selection not working correctly under A11
content:
I am using Open Camera (OC) as my default camera app.  It is more functional than the Google app and has photo stamping, which the Google app does not offer.

I had some problems with OC for a while and finally got them straightened out.  So I wanted to set OC as the default app to open when I manually double-click the power button under A11. 

This used to work fine under A10.  However, under A11, the double-click will work BUT only if the phone is unlocked.  If the phone is locked, the double-click will flash the lock icon on the lock screen but will not show the app. I have to use the fingerprint sensor to unlock the phone first.  Then the OC app will be there and open.

This is obviously not very helpful.

I have tried dropping the default assignment, rebooting the phone and reestablishing it but this has not helped.

Any other ideas or might this be a genuine bug?
